title: Therese Coffey – 2022 Speech to Conservative Party Conference
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Therese Coffey, the Deputy Prime Minister and Health & Social Care Secretary, in Birmingham on 4 October 2022.
content:
Conference, I am delighted to be here in Birmingham for my first speech as Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, and as Deputy Prime Minister.

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
